From: "dph of rules " <dph_of_rules@...>

My own worst opponent in fighting gladiator is a faerie.  For pete's 
sake, those faeries freeze mages and archmages (my favorite 
characters) longer than anything else.  Yep, they freeze a fire 
elemental and clerics for less time with the same hit.  Why?

That brings me to an interesting question:  Is there anything in the 
game that would keep a team of 1 from being frozen in place 
INDEFINITELY?  I mean a character could be surrounded by faeries and 
continiously fired upon and never have a chance to respond because of 
the damn faeries.  

One more thing that bothers me about characters being frozen in
place: 
I had an archmage frozen in place and I could not make him do 
anything.  However, a few moments later (while the archmage was
frozen 
 in place), the archmage summoned chain lightning.  Please explain 
that one to me.

One more question:  is there anything that can BOTH block faeries
from 
 passsing through it AND allow character's attacks to penetrate it? 
I 
tried using rock tiles but faeries can still cross those.  If there
is 
such a tile, I would like to know ASAP so I can redesign a certain 
scenario (#118) which I just finished.  That makes 3 original 
scenarios from me.
